h2_title: Where to use the Past Echo in Black Myth: Wukong
content: This is one of the easier Key Items to find the use for. Our full Lower Hollow walkthrough page will help you through the area, and when it comes to defeating Zhu Bajie.
promot:

This is one of the easier Key Items to find the use for. Our full Lower Hollow walkthrough page will help you through the area, and when it comes to defeating Zhu Bajie.
